title: Ep 125 | Phil's Message for Gavin Newsom, Preaching Heresy, and What a Lot of Religious People Miss
description:
Jase reveals the truth many religious people miss, and it's a doozy. Phil has a Bible verse for California Gov. Gavin Newsom. Al reminisces about the "superhero" blind woman who looked out for him when he was young. And the guys discuss transformations and becoming unrecognizable in Christ, religious hypocrisy, out-of-context Bible verses, breaking wind (again), and what Jase likes to challenge when it comes to religion.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
